description: High severity alert: HackTool:PowerShell/Mimikatz detected on host NUW-BEST-16, which indicates potential unauthorized access to user credentials and system information.

Microsoft Defender Antivirus detected malware (Trojan:PowerShell/PSAttackTool.A) on the host NUW-BEST-16. The malware was found in the powershell_ise.exe process, which is running under the user 'testuser22'. The severity of this threat is high, and immediate action is required.
